attributes.action: Complete the extention of the A27 dual carriageway from Lewes to Polegate East Sussex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the dual carrigeway extended from Lewes to the new Cople roundabout in Polegate to eliminate the congestion every morning on this stretch of road which is 7 miles long , this must cause so much pollution by stationary traffic.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Complete the extention of the A27 dual carriageway from Lewes to Polegate East Sussex."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13286.asp

Prime Minister's Office
